title: Use of Ultraviolet‐Induced Fluorescence Dermoscopy for the Diagnosis of Vitiligo‐Like Lesions in Patients Receiving Immune Checkpoint Inhibitors Therapy for …
details: L Rackauskaite, DCO Jimenez, I Zalaudek - JEADV Clinical Practice, 2025
abstract: Dear Editor, A 39‐year‐old man complained of a painless lymphadenopathy in the left lateral neck. A fine needle biopsy reported the presence of melanoma in the lymph node and the patient was referred to our skin cancer unit. On clinical …
